snippet.title: Assassin’s Creed Valhalla: Cinematic World Premiere Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the world premiere of Assassin’s Creed Valhalla. Wars will rage. Kingdoms will fall. This is the age of the Vikings.

 Assassin’s Creed Valhalla available Holiday 2020 on Xbox Series X, Xbox One, PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Epic Games, Uplay and Stadia. Pre-order now at https://store.ubi.com/

Pre-order now and get an additional mission: The Way of the Berserker

Koda - “Soul of a Man (FFM Remix)” - https://smarturl.it/acv-soam 

Follow Assassin’s Creed:
WEBSITE: https://www.assassinscreed.com
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/assassinscreed
TWITTER: https://www.twitter.com/assassinscreed
